query: How do I enroll my family members in the company health insurance?
response: You can enroll your spouse, children, and dependent parents in the group health insurance during the annual enrollment window (typically in April-May). Submit Form 1 with family details, age proof, and marriage certificate (for spouse). The premium for parents is employee-paid while spouse and children coverage is company-sponsored. Sum insured is Rs. 5 lakhs with top-up option of Rs. 10 lakhs. Monthly premium is employee-borne with payroll deduction. Sum insured includes pre-existing diseases after 3 years, daycare procedures, AYUSH treatment, and Covid-19. Network of 8,000+ hospitals for cashless facility. Pre-policy medical check-up mandatory for parents above 60 years. Premium increases 10% annually. Payment options: subs
